articles.title: Global version of Huawei P50 Pro to be unveiled January 12th - PhoneArena
articles.description: The global version of the Huawei P50 Pro, which has several changes to the Chinese model, will be introduced on January 12th possibly alongside the foldable P50 Pocket.
